attributes.action: Stop extinction of life on Earth by toxic chemtrails if  not past the point of no return?
attributes.additional_details:
Chemtrails are fact. Videos prove it.
Morgellons disease is now rife as people are poisoned. Catlle eat up to 1lb of aluminum that we then ingest! It may be too late. UV levels and acidity rising sharply are killing crops and all life. no point in more than 12 months. We'll probably be dead before then.

rejection.details: The creator of this petition has registered one on this subject
